original: Borg, Ivan Arne Martin, fil. mag., Kalmar, f. 8/6/12 i Bergkvara, Kalmar 1., av Martin B. o. Siri Håkansson. G. 38 m. Elise Margareta Alm. Barn: Lars f. 44. — Stud :ex. i Kalmar 31, fil. mag. i Lund 36, provår v. Hvit-feldtska lärov. i Ghg 42-43. Lär. v. Munkaljungby folkhögsk. 37, extralär. i Kalmar s. å., vik. i Skara o. Luleå 38, e. adj. i Kristianstad 38-39, i Kalmar 39-40, Gävle 41 samt åter i Kalmar 41-42 o. fr. 43, e. o. där 45, därjämte timlär. v. Kalmar yrkessk. 37 o. fr. 43, Kalmar hand:inst. 37 o. 39-40 samt flygv. mansk:sk. fr. 43.
translated: Borg, Ivan Arne Martin, MA, Kalmar, born June 8, 1912 in Bergkvara, Kalmar County, son of Martin B. and Siri Håkansson. Married in 1938 to Elise Margareta Alm. They have one son, Lars, born in 1944. Ivan passed his exam in Kalmar in 1931 and graduated with an MA from Lund in 1936. He spent his probationary year at the Hvitsfeldt School in Gothenburg from 1942 to 1943. He worked as a teacher at the Munkaljungby Public Folk High School in 1937, as a substitute teacher in Kalmar the same year, and as a substitute teacher in Skara and Luleå in 1938. He worked as a probationary assistant in Kristianstad in 1938-1939, in Kalmar in 1939-1940, in Gävle in 1941, and again in Kalmar from 1941 to 1942 and from 1943 as a permanent assistant. He also worked as a part-time teacher at the Kalmar Vocational School from 1937 and from 1943, at the Kalmar Commercial College in 1937 and in 1939-1940, and at the Air Force Men's School from 1943.
